name: Campfire (Sylfstar Games)
description:
You wake up in a forest with a demon closing in on you. Grab all of the shotgun pieces to confront it and take it down!

Credits:

  • Art: Bianca Silva
    • https://www.instagram.com/sylfbia/
  • Programming/Animation: Michael Perez

Made in Unreal Engine 5
